events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it as it does not meet my expectations and I would like a refund.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to customer's request for a money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request and follow up on the case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that the product didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging for the return?
My order number is 987654321, and yes, the product is still sealed and unused in its original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the instructions. I appreciate the support in arranging the return.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance from us.
Since we haven’t heard back from you, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you need any more help.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
